plan.title: Update parcel type to include 'delivered_at' field
plan.description: Add the 'delivered_at' field to the parcel type definition to accommodate the new data from the API.
rationale: Ensure type safety by updating the parcel type definition to include the new 'delivered_at' field.
implementationChecklist: Add 'delivered_at' field to Parcel type in src/types/parcel.ts
Ensure the new field is optional if not always present
doneWhen: 'delivered_at' field is present in Parcel type definition

plan.title: Modify parcel API to include 'delivered_at' field
plan.description: Ensure the parcel API includes the 'delivered_at' field in its response.
rationale: The API must provide the 'delivered_at' data for it to be displayed in the UI.
implementationChecklist: Update API request to ensure 'delivered_at' is included in the response
Test API response to confirm 'delivered_at' is received

plan.title: Add 'Delivered At' column to Parcels page
plan.description: Add a new column for 'Delivered At' in the Parcels table and ensure it is visible by default.
rationale: Display the 'Delivered At' information to users as per the new feature requirements.
implementationChecklist: Add 'Delivered At' column to the table in src/pages/Parcels.tsx
Ensure the column displays 'Not Delivered' if data is not available
doneWhen: 'Delivered At' column is visible on the Parcels page

plan.title: Update TableRenderer to support 'Delivered At' column
plan.description: Modify the TableRenderer component to handle the new 'Delivered At' column, including sorting and formatting.
rationale: Ensure the table can render and sort the new 'Delivered At' column correctly.
implementationChecklist: Update column definitions to include 'Delivered At'
Format 'Delivered At' using the specified format: DD MMM YYYY, hh:mm A
doneWhen: TableRenderer supports 'Delivered At' column with sorting

plan.title: Add tests for 'Delivered At' column functionality
plan.description: Write tests to ensure the 'Delivered At' column is displayed correctly and supports sorting.
rationale: Verify that the new column is correctly implemented and does not break existing functionality.
implementationChecklist: Add test cases for displaying 'Delivered At' column
Add test cases for sorting functionality
Ensure tests cover scenarios where 'delivered_at' is missing
doneWhen: Tests for 'Delivered At' column pass successfully

acceptanceCriteria: All TypeScript compilation errors are resolved (tsc exits 0)
All existing tests continue to pass after changes
